Package org.pentaho.di.core.logging

This package contains the Log4j Kettle appenders and Kettle layout as well as the Kettle Log Message.

Package org.pentaho.di.core.logging Description

This package contains the Log4j Kettle appenders and Kettle layout as well as the Kettle Log Message.
